This file provides some exploratory analysis of the InstaCart data.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tufte)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE, message=FALSE, cache.extra = packageVersion('tufte'))
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
```

# Reading in the data
```{r cache=TRUE}
aisles = read_csv("Final Project/Source/aisles.csv")
departments = read_csv("Final Project/Source/departments.csv")
products = read_csv("Final Project/Source/products.csv")
```

Merging all product related configure

```{r}
warehouse <- products%>%
  left_join(departments)%>%
  left_join(aisles)

sku <- warehouse%>%
  group_by(department,aisle)%>%
  summarise(total=n())

```
